Name: JojaCola Generator
Description: Pierre is smart, so smart infact, he invented a machine which uses Joja Cola as a fuel source, by adding 10 cans, you too can make 1 battery, I bet Morris feels envious.

DescriptionLocalization.zh: 皮埃尔非常聪明，发明了一台能把Joja可乐作为燃料的机器，加入10罐可乐，你就能获得一块电池，莫里斯一定非常嫉妒。
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine vom ach so cleveren Pierre entwickelte Maschine. Wandelt 10x Dosen Joja-Cola in 1x Batterie um - Morris wird sicherlich neidisch sein.
